issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description:
Hi,

i tried to install Titanium SDK through "Check for Updates". I am getting the following error:

!MESSAGE (Build 3.0.2.201302191606) [ERROR] com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile/debug/dashboard Error retreiving the JSON content for the Mobile SDK configurations
!STACK 0
java.lang.IllegalStateException: Unexpected 'u while seeking  "false"
	at com.aptana.jetty.util.epl.ajax.JSON.complete(JSON.java:1300)
	at com.aptana.jetty.util.epl.ajax.JSON.parse(JSON.java:880)
	at com.aptana.jetty.util.epl.ajax.JSON.parse(JSON.java:724)
	at com.aptana.jetty.util.epl.ajax.JSON.parse(JSON.java:204)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.ui.portal.processor.MobileSDKConfigurationHelper.readRemoteSDKRequirements(MobileSDKConfigurationHelper.java:321)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.ui.portal.processor.MobileSDKConfigurationHelper.getLatestSDKInfo(MobileSDKConfigurationHelper.java:273)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.ui.portal.processor.MobileSDKConfigurationHelper.getVersionInfo(MobileSDKConfigurationHelper.java:97)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.ui.portal.processor.MobileSDKConfigurationProcessor.computeStatus(MobileSDKConfigurationProcessor.java:101)
	at com.aptana.configurations.processor.AbstractConfigurationProcessor.getStatus(AbstractConfigurationProcessor.java:154)
	at com.appcelerator.titanium.mobile.ui.portal.actionController.MobileSDKActionController$1.run(MobileSDKActionController.java:124)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:54)

comments.body: Itsw working now.. Please close this issue..
